feed.title: GitHub Witcher Script Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Witcher Script in GitHub

entry.title: apokryphus/advanced-combat-system
entry.summary: ACS grants the player the ability to use all humanoid NPC combat animations available in the game, such as Eredin's, Olgierd's, Dettlaff's, spear, halberd, etc, along with numerous special abilities. Also enhances the AI and behavior of certain human enemies, adds various NPC weapons as enemy loot, and spawns custom monsters into the game world.
